#Text=( (
#Text=Mike Halterman
#Text=) )
#Text=After Eurovision , you made a transformation from an unknown singing hopeful to a true recording artist .
#Text=Tell us a bit about your transformation , and how you felt during this time .
#Text=Also , around this time you started to perform in concerts and festivals abroad .
#Text=What was your best memory from this time , when you were performing abroad and people from outside Malta not only knew who you were , but were interested in your life and music .
#Text=Chiara
#Text=: Everything came like rain in my life , from one thing to the other , and before I knew it I became " Chiara of Malta .

#Text= I loved it , but I did n't have much time to think about it .

column1: #Text=Chiara
#Text=: " Angel " is a love song and it will always have a special place in my heart .
#Text=It 's about the love you give someone without wanting anything back , and the unlimited support too .
#Text=( (
#Text=Mike Halterman
#Text=) )
#Text=You achieved the best placing for Malta in Eurovision history with your performance in 2005 .
#Text=What did you learn from your experiences in 1998 and , in your mind , how did you improve to become more successful in 2005 ?
#Text=Chiara
#Text=:
#Text=I think it 's the maturity and the experience . [ Through ] the years , without knowing , you [ gather ] so many lessons and behave better and take things a bit more serious and so on .
#Text=( (
#Text=Mike Halterman
#Text=) )
#Text=Surely you 've read not only supportive comments , but negative ones as well , particularly concerning your weight .
#Text=At the same time , however , you have become a role model of sorts for fuller-figured women across Europe , who are n't accustomed to seeing " people like them " at Eurovision .

#Text=How did you deal with the negativity , both in the context of the Contest and in your personal life , and what message do you hope to give to full-figured women who look to you for inspiration ?
#Text=Chiara
#Text=: Well , I have always been " full figured , " as you put it .
#Text=I have spent time in my life trying to become as thin as I could , but I could never make it .
#Text=Through the years I have learnt to accept myself and love me for what I am and how I look .
#Text=I feel I have nothing less than others and my advice is to be happy with yourself , and love yourself , because you can never get someone to love you if you yourself do n't .
